title: A Favor for a Favor
itunes:title: A Favor for a Favor
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Just a small favor...

***

Written by Vincent Vena Cava and guest narrated by Adal Rifai and Cynthia Reinhardt

***

Read more from VVV at https://www.amazon.com/dp/0692840419/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_apa_i_rd5cEb939TBDR

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
